title: Thermax inks pact with Ceres Power to provide green hydrogen solutions
description: Thermax has partnered with Ceres Power to manufacture large-scale Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cells (SOEC) for green hydrogen production. This collaboration aims to create efficient systems that utilize industrial waste heat, targeting industries like steel and refineries. Thermax will establish a manufacturing facility and localize components, marking a significant step in India's green hydrogen landscape.
